I.name: Shurima's Legacy
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever a {{tip|turret}} outside the enemy team's base is destroyed, a marker is placed above its ruins which can be targeted by '''Azir'''.

{{sbc|Innate - Disc of the Sun:}} '''Azir''' can select a marker to construct the {{as|Sun Disc|buzzword2}} above the ruins after a {{fd|0.5}}-second [[cast time]]. The {{as|Sun Disc|buzzword2}} will activate after being assembled over 5 seconds.

The {{as|Sun Disc|buzzword2}} functions the same as a standard [[Turret#Inner_turret|inner turret]], gains {{as|15% AP}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}, and grants its kill credit to '''Azir'''. The {{as|Sun Disc's|buzzword2}} {{sti|{{as|health}}}} decays over 60 seconds and loses {{sti|armor|{{as|100 armor}}}} while '''Azir''' is not alive or is too far away.
'''Azir''' cannot construct a {{as|Sun Disc|buzzword2}} with the marker while he is unable to cast abilities.
''See [[Azir/LoL#Pets|Pets]] for more details about the {{as|Sun Disc|buzzword2}}.''
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Whenever a turret outside the enemy team's base is destroyed, a marker is placed above its ruins which can be targeted by Azir.
Innate - Disc of the Sun: Azir can select a marker to construct the Sun Disc above the ruins after a 0.5-second cast time. The Sun Disc will activate after being assembled over 5 seconds.
The Sun Disc functions the same as a standard Turret#Inner_turret, gains 15% AP bonus attack damage, and grants its kill credit to Azir. The Sun Disc's health decays over 60 seconds and loses 100 armor while Azir is not alive or is too far away.
Azir cannot construct a Sun Disc with the marker while he is unable to cast abilities.
See Azir/LoL#Pets for more details about the Sun Disc.

Q.name: Conquering Sands
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Azir''' orders all {{as|Sand Soldiers|buzzword2}} to dash toward the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies they pass through and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 25% for 1 second.
Enemies hit by subsequent soldiers are instead {{tip|slow|slowed}} by an additional 25% per soldier.
''Conquering Sands will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Azir orders all Sand Soldiers to dash toward the target location, dealing magic damage to all enemies they pass through and slowing them by 25% for 1 second.
Enemies hit by subsequent soldiers are instead slowed by an additional 25% per soldier.
Conquering Sands will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
Q.notes: * {{as|Sand Soldiers|buzzword2}} will stop their movement upon colliding with {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} but not with {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}.

W.name: Arise!
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Azir''' periodically [[stock]]s a {{as|Sand Soldier|buzzword2}}, up to a maximum of 2. '''Azir''' also gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, doubled for 5 seconds if he summons a third concurrent soldier.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Azir''' [[Champion summoned units|summons]] an {{tip|untargetable}} {{as|Sand Soldier|buzzword2}} at the target location that lasts 10 seconds and grants {{tip|sight}} of its surroundings, expiring twice as fast while within range of an enemy {{tip|turret}}, and expiring instantly if '''Azir''' moves too far away.

When '''Azir''' selects an enemy in a soldier's attack range, the {{as|Sand Soldier|buzzword2}} attacks in his stead, dealing {{pp|50 to 62 by 2;65 to 80 by 5;90 to 150 by 10|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} in a line. Targets beyond the closest take {{pp|key=%|25 to 100 for 4|1 to 16}} damage. Subsequent {{as|Sand Soldiers|buzzword2}} beyond the first deal 25% damage.
''Arise! will cast at max range if cast beyond that. See [[Azir/LoL#Pets|Pets]] for more details about {{as|Sand Soldiers|buzzword2}}.''
W.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Azir periodically stocks a Sand Soldier, up to a maximum of 2. Azir also gains bonus attack speed, doubled for 5 seconds if he summons a third concurrent soldier.
Active: Azir Champion summoned units an untargetable Sand Soldier at the target location that lasts 10 seconds and grants sight of its surroundings, expiring twice as fast while within range of an enemy turret, and expiring instantly if Azir moves too far away.
When Azir selects an enemy in a soldier's attack range, the Sand Soldier attacks in his stead, dealing 50 − 62 by 2;65 (based on level) (+ 60% AP) magic damage in a line. Targets beyond the closest take 1 to 16 ‒ undefined damage. Subsequent Sand Soldiers beyond the first deal 25% damage.
Sand Soldiers cannot attack structures, wards, and traps.
Arise! will cast at max range if cast beyond that. See Azir/LoL#Pets for more details about Sand Soldiers.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|15 to 55}}%|Increased Attack Speed|{{ap|15*2 to 55*2}}%}}
W.notes:
* {{tip|Nearsight|Nearsighting}} effects will only allow '''Azir''' to perform attacks from soldiers within his own sight radius.
* '''Azir''' must rank ''Arise!'' as his first ability, and will do so automatically if he reaches level 2 before ranking an ability.
* '''Azir''' can only command his soldiers to attack if he is able to declare [[basic attack]] commands himself, meaning {{tip|crowd control}} effects that disable attacking, such as {{tip|disarm}}, do not allow him to order his soldiers to attack in his stead.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block a single attack from the soldiers.
* Damage to enemy champions from ''Sand Soldier'' stabs will draw minion aggro even if the enemy champion was not the primary target.{{bug|2}}
* Attacking with the soldiers will trigger {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.
* {{as|Sand Soldiers|buzzword2}} will attack the closest enemy to '''Azir''' when using attack move (or {{sbc|A + RMB}} / {{sbc|Shift + RMB}}) or {{tip|acquisition radius|auto-attack}}.
[[File:Azir_Sand_Soldier_screenshot.png|thumb|left|250px|An exclamation mark ('''!''') will appear above the {{as|'''Sand Soldier's'''|buzzword2}} head when within the range of an enemy {{tip|turret}}.]]

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %
  • Increased Attack Speed: %

E.name: Shifting Sands
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Azir''' {{tip|shield|shields}} himself for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and {{tip|dashes}} to the target {{as|Sand Soldier|buzzword2}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies he passes through.
If '''Azir''' dashes into an enemy {{tip|champion}}, he stops and gains a charge of ''{{ai|Arise!|Azir}}''.
'''Azir''' is not locked out of casting any other spells during the dash.
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Azir shields himself for 1.5 seconds and dashes to the target Sand Soldier, dealing magic damage to enemies he passes through.
If Azir dashes into an enemy champion, he stops and gains a charge of Azir's Arise!.
Azir is not locked out of casting any other spells during the dash.
leveling: {{st|Shield Strength|{{ap|70 to 230}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|60 to 180}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
E.notes: * '''Azir''' will track the {{as|Sand Soldier|buzzword2}} if they change locations, such as by {{ai|Conquering Sands|Azir}}.

effects.str:
• Shield Strength: (+ 60% AP)
  • Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)

R.name: Emperor's Divide
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Azir''' calls forth a phalanx of soldiers from {{tt|175|See notes}} units behind him, picking up enemies from up to {{tt|325|See notes}} units behind him, charging forward {{tt|575|See notes}} units in the target direction.
Enemies impacted by the charge are dealt {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocked away}} over 1 second to a line 650 units in front of '''Azir'''.

When the soldiers finish their charge, they stand as a wall for 5 seconds, acting as impassible terrain against enemies and granting {{tip|sight}} of their surroundings. '''Azir''' and his allies can move through these soldiers.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Azir calls forth a phalanx of soldiers from 175 units behind him, picking up enemies from up to 325 units behind him, charging forward 575 units in the target direction.
Enemies impacted by the charge are dealt magic damage and knocked away over 1 second to a line 650 units in front of Azir.
When the soldiers finish their charge, they stand as a wall for 5 seconds, acting as impassible terrain against enemies and granting sight of their surroundings. Azir and his allies can move through these soldiers.
leveling: {{st|Width|{{ap|6 to 8}} soldiers|Width (charge)|{{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{ap|620 to 820}}|Width (impassable wall)|{{tip|pathing radius|icononly = true}} {{ap|750 to 950}}}}
R.notes:
* The soldier units are spawned only 175 units behind '''Azir''', but do not control the {{tip|airborne|knock back}} directly. Each comes with a missile that travels the same path and conveys the damage and knockback effect.
** The furthest area (from 325 to 175 units behind '''Azir''') is covered by a separate set of missiles with the same effects.
** All of the soldiers and their missiles will end the charge prematurely when one encounters {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} / {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} / {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}} or upon colliding with terrain that they cannot charge through.
* The charge starts at {{fd|0.25}} seconds into the cast time.
** If '''Azir''' dies before this point, the soldiers will still form the wall but the missiles will not spawn, therefore not dealing damage or knocking back.{{bug}}
{{Effect at cast time start}}
* When the dash of the soldiers comes to a halt, all not-yet-affected enemies on top of the soldiers' landing locations (125 radius) are also knocked back.
* ''Emperor's Divide'' will not be canceled if '''Azir''' dies during the cast time.
* While the soldiers are charging forward, the wall is not impassable terrain. 
** This means enemies that are immune to {{tip|airborne}} effects can pass through the wall while its moving.
* The wall '''will''' count as terrain for the purposes of 'into terrain' effects (e.g. {{ai|Condemn|Vayne}}, {{ai|Dredge Line|Nautilus}}, {{ai|Heroic Charge|Poppy}}). This will only affect enemies, allies will pass through the wall in all circumstances, even if knocked into it by an enemy.

effects.str:
• Width: soldiers
  • Width (charge): er
  • Width (impassable wall): pathing radius

st_slices: pathing radius
